name: jubilee
description: Custom vinyl creation app with Spotify integration

scripts.develop: concurrently "cd server && npm run watch" "cd client && npm start"
scripts.install-all: cd server && npm i && cd ../client && npm i
scripts.build-pwa: cd client && GENERATE_SOURCEMAP=false npm run build
scripts.heroku-postbuild: npm run install-all && npm run build
